answerText: Antoine de Saint-Exupery[10] This other twentieth-century French writer wrote about Fred Peloux in Chéri, as well as four novels about Claudine and the novella Gigi.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 5 | 15 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man detailed his time working for Aeropostale in Wind, Sand and Stars. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author better known for a novella in which the title character lives on an asteroid called B-612, The Little Prince.
